SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.controller.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Observable
This class acts as the controller of the model It transforms the requests made by the client into actions on the game Extends from the Observable class for the observer design pattern
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getGameInfo

      public ConnectionState getGameInfo()
      Method to request which kind of way to connect to the game
      Returns:
      ConnectionState

    • createGame

      public int createGame(MessageListener l, String nickname, int numPlayers) throws NumberPlayerWrongException, GameFullException, NicknameInvalidException, NicknameAlreadyInUseException, GameAlreadyCreatedException
      Method to create new game
      Parameters:
      l - Reference to the calling object, used to receive notification for observer pattern
      nickname - Name of the player
      numPlayers - Number of players that are going to play the game
      Returns:
      0 if game successfully created, otherwise an exception is raised
      Throws:
      NumberPlayerWrongException - if the numPlayers provided is not in the possible interval
      GameFullException - if the game has already all players connected
      NicknameInvalidException - if the nickname doesn't have a valid format
      NicknameAlreadyInUseException - if the nickname has already been chosen by another player
      GameAlreadyCreatedException

    • connect

      public boolean connect(MessageListener l, String nickname) throws GameFullException, NicknameInvalidException, NicknameAlreadyInUseException
      Standard way of connecting to newly created game
      Parameters:
      l - Reference to the calling object, used to receive notification for observer pattern
      nickname - Name of the player
      Returns:
      true if the connection works without problems, otherwise it throws an exception
      Throws:
      GameFullException - if the game has already all players connected
      NicknameInvalidException - if the nickname doesn't have a valid format
      NicknameAlreadyInUseException - if the nickname has already been chosen by another player

    • reconnect

      public boolean reconnect(MessageListener l, String nickname) throws GameFullException, NicknameInvalidException, NicknameAlreadyInUseException, GameAlreadyCreatedException
      Standard way of connecting to saved game AND loading up saved game
      Parameters:
      l - Reference to the calling object, used to receive notification for observer pattern
      nickname - Name of the player
      Returns:
      true if the connection works without problems, otherwise it throws an exception
      Throws:
      GameFullException - if the game has already all players connected
      NicknameInvalidException - if the nickname doesn't have a valid format
      NicknameAlreadyInUseException - if the nickname has already been chosen by another player
      GameAlreadyCreatedException

      public Set<Position> getAvailablePositions(String p) throws WrongTurnException
      Method to get the available positions to place of the current player
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      set with available positions
      Throws:
      WrongTurnException

    • place

      public boolean place(String p, Face face, Position position) throws RequirementsNotMetException, WrongTurnException
      Method called by the current player to place a specific face on a specific position
      Parameters:
      p - Nickname of method caller
      face - Selected Face
      position - Selected Position
      Returns:
      true if placed successfully, otherwise throws an exception
      Throws:
      RequirementsNotMetException - if the player's board doesn't fulfill the face requirements
      WrongTurnException

    • pick

      public void pick(String p, PlayableCard card) throws WrongTurnException
      Method called by the current player to pick one of the pickable cards from the deck
      Parameters:
      p - Nickname of method caller
      card - Selected Card to add to hand
      Throws:
      WrongTurnException

    • placeStarting

      public List<PlayersColor> placeStarting(String p, Face face) throws WrongTurnException
      Method called by the current player to place THE FIRST face (of the starting card) on the board
      Parameters:
      p - Nickname of method caller
      face - Selected face
      Returns:
      The list of available colors, the player now has to choose which one to use
      Throws:
      WrongTurnException

    • chooseColor

      public List<GoalCard> chooseColor(String p, PlayersColor color) throws WrongTurnException
      Method called by the current player to select which color to identify itself
      Parameters:
      p - Nickname of method caller
      color - the Selected Color
      Returns:
      The list of objectives, the player now has to select which one it should choose
      Throws:
      WrongTurnException
